hero.subtitle: Connect with expert cuppers and elevate your coffee's value with professional sensory analysis.

featureOne.title: Sensory Analysis for Growers
featureOne.description: Document your coffee's unique sensory profile with a secure digital certificate

featureTwo.title: Direct Certification Process
featureTwo.description: Connect directly with expert cuppers for authentic evaluation and certification of your coffee

featureThree.title: Quality Recognition
featureThree.description: Gain recognition for the exceptional quality of your coffee on the global market

stepOne.title: Request Analysis
stepOne.description: Coffee growers submit a request for sensory analysis of their coffee lot.

stepTwo.title: Cupper Acceptance
stepTwo.description: Certified cuppers review and accept offers to perform sensory analysis.

stepThree.title: Professional Analysis
stepThree.description: The coffee is evaluated by the cupper.

stepFour.title: Certificate Creation
stepFour.description: A digital certificate representing your coffee's sensory profile is generated.

stepFive.title: Showcase Your Quality
stepFive.description: Use your certificate to prove and promote your coffee's exceptional quality.

featureOne.title: Certified Cuppers
featureOne.description: Our global network of expert cuppers ensures precise and reliable evaluations.

featureTwo.title: Rigorous Verification
featureTwo.description: All cuppers undergo a thorough verification process to ensure their expertise and credibility.

featureThree.title: Collaborative Community
featureThree.description: Fosters knowledge exchange between coffee growers and coffee experts.

login.title: Welcome back to caficultores.co

benefitOne.title: Reliable Sensory Analysis Certificates
benefitOne.description: Obtain digital certificates that demonstrate your coffee's quality, backed by expert cuppers.

benefitTwo.title: New Market Opportunities
benefitTwo.description: Attract buyers interested in specialty coffees with certificates that validate your product's quality.

benefitThree.title: Progress Tracking
benefitThree.description: Monitor how your coffee quality improves over time with a detailed record of your previous scores.

benefitFour.title: Valuable Connections
benefitFour.description: Connect directly with cuppers and buyers to build trusted relationships in the industry.

benefitOne.title: Professional Recognition
benefitOne.description: Your sensory analyses are digitally recorded, backing your expertise and knowledge in the sector.

benefitTwo.title: Discover Exceptional Coffees
benefitTwo.description: Work with producers committed to excellence and expand your network in the industry.

benefitThree.title: Contribute to Coffee Quality
benefitThree.description: Help create a transparent system that elevates quality standards in the coffee industry.

benefitFour.title: Professional Growth
benefitFour.description: Participate in an innovative platform that seeks to improve the entire coffee value chain.
